alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Van Buren, western Cleburne, northeastern Conway and north central Faulkner Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Claude, or 7 miles southwest of Clinton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton... Greenbrier... Guy... Damascus... Twin Groves... Fairbanks... Whipple... Claude... Choctaw... Bee Branch... Beverage Town... Austin in Conway County... Southside in Van Buren County... Morganton... Scotland... Culpepper... Formosa... Choctow Recreation Area... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County
